For most couples, its the day theyve always dreamed of.
A big white wedding, celebrating their love in front of friends and family.
But when the COVID-19 pandemic hit, large gatherings were banned … [+1717 chars]

articles.title: Twitch Finally Starts Banning Streamers Accused Of Sexual Abuse - Kotaku Australia
articles.description: Over the weekend, over 50 people, mostly women, in and around the world of Twitch came forward to accuse streamers and other industry figures, mostly men, of sexual abuse. As the week has progressed, that number has swelled to nearly 100. After the initial wa…
